sentences: Joshua Jacob Morrow (born February 8, 1974) is an American actor.
In 1994, he began his career when he was cast in the role of Nicholas Newman on The Young and the Restless.
From 1998 he joined the soul-pop group 3Deep; the group disbanded in 2001.
On August 4, 2001, Morrow married Tobe Keeney.
